column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Loved the food! I came here with three people and we ordered eight tapa dishes and all of the 6 pintxos. My faves of the night were the grilled octopus
column4: and the grilled hanger steak.  In terms of portion
column5: I'd say I was satisfied after the first five dishes+pintxos (which were bite-sized and not particularly shareable)
column6: but my party chose to order more. Everything we had were delicious and we finished every bite. At the end of our meal
column7: the manager (?) came by and presented us with four free desserts because "it was our first time here." What a pleasant & sweet surprise!  All of the desserts were delicious
column8: but my fave was the butterscotch pudding shooters.
